name: Scouter [1]
description: An advanced piece of technology, it feels as if your reactions are quicker and more accurate whilst wearing it. Also contains a powerful personal shield generator, granting protection in combat. Allows the user to sense their target's power level and weaknesses.
stats: Enables use of level 1 Monster Property and level 1 Body Relocation.
Enables use of level 1 Monster Property. DEX + 10, ASPD + 15% [Super Novice]
bonuses: Reduce SP Consumption of skills by 20%
CRIT +15 (30 with Rifles) and 20% more damage with Critical Hits
Ignore [Gatling Fever] FLEE and Movement Speed penalties. Dispell [Gatling Fever] on unequip
5% chance to auto cast Stone Curse status when attacking
Add a 25% chance to ignore ammo costs when using skills or attacking normally. Skills that consume more than 2 bullets only consume 2 bullets
Shotgun Equipped: ASPD +25%. 20% more damage with [Full Blaster]. 50% more damage with [Spread Attack]
Grenade Launcher Equipped: 50% more damage with [Triple Action]. [Ground Drift] Duration +30 secs, and, PvM, add 4 more Mines, trigger/splash AoE becomes 5x5
Gatling Gun Equipped: 20% more damage with Long Range Attacks and Critical Hits. Ignore [Gatling Fever] FLEE and Movement Speed penalties, dispelled on unequip
Enables use of level 1 [Hyper Spirit Sphere]
Rifle Equipped: 25% more damage with [Piercing Shot] and [Tracking]. 25% less cast time with [Tracking]
Triple the duration of [Madness Canceller] and [Adjustment]
Immunity to Blind Status. Base AGI >= 88: Immunity to Stun Status. Base VIT >= 88: Immunity to Sleep Status
